ee.bpw.dhx.util

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • ee.bpw.dhx.util.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods related to files. e.g. creating files, reading files, zipping and unzipping, base64 endocding and decoding
    Author:
    Aleksei Kokarev

      • extractAndUnpackAttachment

        public static java.io.File extractAndUnpackAttachment(javax.activation.DataHandler attachment)
                                               throws DhxException
        Method extract attachment and unpacks attachment from datahandler and returns as file. Internally base64 decode and gzip unzip is done.
        Parameters:
        attachment - - datahandler of the attachment
        Returns:
        unpacked attachment file
        Throws:
        DhxException - - throws if error occurs while unpacking attachment

      • createPipelineFile

        public static java.io.File createPipelineFile()
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Generates operationsystem temporary file with unique name. File is written to java.io.tmpdir
        Returns:
        created file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - thrown if error occurs while creating file

        Gets file from classpath or from filesystem by files path.
        Parameters:
        path - - path of the file. if start with jar://, then searches from classpath
        Returns:
        - file
        Throws:
        DhxException - - throws if error occurs while getting file

      • gzipPackXml

        public static java.io.File gzipPackXml(java.io.File fileToZip)
                                throws DhxException
        Packs the file with gzip. Internally creates new file for gzipping and returns it.
        Parameters:
        fileToZip - - file which needs to be gzipped and base64 encoded
        Returns:
        - gzipped base64 file
        Throws:
        DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while gzipping or base64 encoding file

                                     throws DhxException
